summary: This document appears to be preparation notes for trial testimony, discussing the organization of evidence files, specifically referencing exhibits GX 424 and GX 54. It notes that metadata from a computer purchased by JE's company was found on a drive and discusses the possibility of altering document metadata in 2007.

connections.description: JE's company purchased a computer that contained data related to GM's emails (GX 424 was in a folder for GM).

keyFacts: Emails were organized into different files or folders for each individual person, with GX 424 being in a folder for GM.
The asset tag on exhibit GX 54 indicated the computer copy was made from a computer purchased by JE's company.
It was possible to change certain metadata categories in Word documents in 2007, though tools to do so were rare.
